job_history.work_description: Administrative Assistant to the President/CEO of statewide mental health organization. Collaborated with doctors, therapists, and administrators to originate monthly billing and reports involving corporate accounts such as nursing facilities and state-funded mental health facilities. Responsible for accounts payable/accounts receivable that includes medical billing/processing for the President/CEO's private patients and the month end financial closing process. Responsible for all medical transcription for approximately 10 doctors and therapists.

Reported directly to store owner providing retail pricing and in-house promotional work for entire store. This included Direct Store Delivery invoicing, preparing annual profit reports and working directly with all account representatives from various food companies.

Assist the Senior Pastor in developing marketing programs realizing a 6% increase in attendance over the previous year. This includes the designing/creation/printing of promotional work including in-house and direct mailings, weekly church program with activities, programs, information and more, and weekly PowerPoint presentations.
Provide secretarial and administrative support functions to various members of the Retail Leadership Team and their support staff in an efficient and effective manner.

Provide administrative and professional support to the Vice President & CIO and HR Director, Global Finance & IT along with 10+ members of the Global Leadership Team and their support staff in an efficient and effective manner.

Team with Chief Human Resources Officer and the Senior Vice President, Global Sales and Marketing, providing administrative and professional support to ensure the effective, efficient and confidential operations for the office of the Senior Vice President of Human Resources and the office of Global Sales and Marketing under minimum supervision.

skills.name: Administrative Support
skills.explanation: Over two decades of experience providing administrative support to various executives and teams, indicating expert-level mastery.

skills.name: Leadership
skills.explanation: Demonstrated leadership skills by assisting in the development of marketing programs and working directly with account representatives, suggesting strong proficiency.

skills.name: Communication
skills.explanation: Effectively communicated with various stakeholders, including doctors, therapists, and administrators, indicating strong proficiency.

skills.name: Project Management
skills.explanation: Managed multiple projects, including marketing programs and promotional work, showing a solid working proficiency.

skills.name: Time Management
skills.explanation: Demonstrated ability to manage time effectively by handling multiple responsibilities and deadlines, suggesting strong proficiency.

skills.name: Organizational Management
skills.explanation: Completed a Bachelor's degree in Organizational Management Human Resources, showing a solid working proficiency.

skills.name: Graphic Design
skills.explanation: Designed and created promotional materials, including in-house and direct mailings, and weekly PowerPoint presentations, indicating some practical experience.

skills.name: Accounting
skills.explanation: Handled accounts payable and accounts receivable, including medical billing and processing, indicating some practical experience.

skills.name: Microsoft Office
skills.explanation: Likely used extensively for administrative tasks, suggesting strong proficiency.
